page.title: 08SHOPPING continued
page.content: There are still a number of small, long established family corner shops serving our area, but the numbers have dwindled in the wake of the spread of self-service supermarkets. Other businesses have changed with the times.{H. Ponsfords Ltd.}began life 100 years ago as a corner shop selling furniture to working class people. Now it is a much larger premises, the firm selling reproduction,traditional "English furniture" for a middle class clientelle. They also export furniture to the U.S.A.
